title: On the Edge
description: “This is the story of Sh-har Tianami taken from the Rememberings in the Year of the Strangers. Listen to me, for I am dead.” Sh-har Tianami welcomed the outsiders to Home Tree Island, evangelists for the living god Rru-Tia. But when the silvered words were spoken, and old allegiances broken, this new god would demand blood...
author: Gill Shutt
